en: Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军纪和行为准则，最初由毛泽东在1927年提出，内容在后续几年中逐步完善。其同名歌曲也广为流传。
description.en: The military discipline and code of conduct for the People's Liberation Army, first proposed by Mao Zedong in 1927 and gradually refined in subsequent years. A song of the same name is also widely known.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1927年由毛泽东领导的、中国共产党在湖南、江西边境地区发动的武装起义。
description.en: An armed uprising in 1927, led by Mao Zedong, launched by the Communist Party of China in the border region of Hunan and Jiangxi provinces.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、军事家、诗人，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China, which he ruled as the chairman of the Communist Party of China from its establishment in 1949 until his death in 1976.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军负责政治思想、组织和纪律工作的最高领导机关。
description.en: Formerly the highest leading organ for political, organizational, and disciplinary work in the People's Liberation Army.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army
Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Revolutionary Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第二次国内革命战争时期领导的武装力量，是中国人民解放军的前身。
description.en: The armed forces of the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Chinese Civil War, and the predecessor of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 井冈山地区的武装首领之一，后加入中国工农红军。
description.en: One of the armed leaders in the Jinggang Mountains area who later joined the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 井冈山地区的武装首领之一，后加入中国工农红军。
description.en: One of the armed leaders in the Jinggang Mountains area who later joined the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，上将军衔。
description.en: A senior general in the People's Liberation Army with the rank of Shang Jiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国江西省吉安市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Ji'an, Jiangxi, China.

en: Suichuan County Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任红15军团政治部秘书长，参与编写《三大纪律八项注意》歌词。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Secretary-General of the Political Department of the 15th Red Army Corps and participated in writing the lyrics for the song 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央军委副主席，参与编写《三大纪律八项注意》歌词。
description.en: A senior general in the People's Liberation Army who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, and participated in writing the lyrics for the song 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention'.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队，由红25军和陕北、陕甘红军合编而成。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, formed by the merger of the 25th Red Army and the Red Army units from Northern Shaanxi and Shaanxi-Gansu.

description.zh-cn: 鄂豫皖苏区的一首革命歌曲，其曲谱被用于《三大纪律八项注意》歌曲。
description.en: A revolutionary song from the Eyuwan Soviet, whose musical score was used for the song 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention'.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯在天津小站练兵时使用的歌曲，其曲调被多支军队改编使用，包括《三大纪律八项注意》歌曲。
description.en: A song used by Yuan Shikai during the Xiaozhan military training in Tianjin. Its melody was adapted and used by various armies, including for the song 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention'.

description.zh-cn: 中国晚清时期重要的军事和政治人物，中华民国第一任正式大总统。
description.en: A key military and political figure in late Qing dynasty China and the first formal president of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 清末在天津小站进行的军事改革和训练，对中国军事现代化有重要影响。
description.en: Military reforms and training conducted at Xiaozhan, Tianjin, during the late Qing dynasty, which had a significant impact on China's military modernization.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在国民政府时期的国家军队，由中国国民党建立。
description.en: The military arm of the Kuomintang (KMT) from 1925 to 1947 in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治家、军事家，曾任中华民国总统及中国国民党总裁。
description.en: A Chinese political and military leader who served as the leader of the Republic of China between 1928 and 1975.

description.zh-cn: 在美国洛杉矶举办的第23届夏季奥林匹克运动会。
description.en: The 23rd Summer Olympic Games held in Los Angeles, United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia, led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国（台湾）在国际体育赛事中使用的名称。
description.en: The name used by the Republic of China (Taiwan) in international sporting events.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆对台湾的广播电台。
description.en: A radio station from mainland China broadcasting to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，洋务派代表人物。
description.en: A prominent official in the late Qing dynasty and a representative of the Self-Strengthening Movement.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由张之洞创办的军工企业。
description.en: A military-industrial enterprise founded by Zhang Zhidong during the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1927年10月23日首次提出“三大纪律”，并在之后几年内逐步补充完善为“三大纪律八项注意”。
description.en: Mao Zedong first proposed the 'Three Rules of Discipline' on October 23, 1927, and gradually supplemented and perfected them into the 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention' in the following years.

description.zh-cn: “三大纪律”最初是为即将进入井冈山的秋收起义部队制定的。
description.en: The 'Three Rules of Discipline' were initially formulated for the Autumn Harvest Uprising troops who were about to enter the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 该纪律由中国共产党领导的秋收起义部队颁布和执行。
description.en: The discipline was promulgated and enforced by the Autumn Harvest Uprising troops led by the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 1947年10月10日，中国人民解放军总政治部发布训令，重新颁布了三大纪律八项注意的统一版本。
description.en: On October 10, 1947, the General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army issued an order to re-promulgate a unified version of the Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention.

description.zh-cn: 三大纪律八项注意成为中国工农红军及其后身中国人民解放军的基本行为准则，帮助其赢得了群众支持。
description.en: The Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention became the basic code of conduct for the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and its successor, the People's Liberation Army, helping it win popular support.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是秋收起义的主要领导人。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the main leader of the Autumn Harvest Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东率部上井冈山前，为与当地袁文才、王佐的部队搞好关系，制定了军纪。
description.en: Before leading his troops up the Jinggang Mountains, Mao Zedong formulated military discipline to establish good relations with the local forces of Yuan Wencai and Wang Zuo.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东率部上井冈山前，为与当地袁文才、王佐的部队搞好关系，制定了军纪。
description.en: Before leading his troops up the Jinggang Mountains, Mao Zedong formulated military discipline to establish good relations with the local forces of Yuan Wencai and Wang Zuo.

description.zh-cn: 陈正人时任中共遂川县委书记。
description.en: Chen Zhengren served as the Secretary of the CPC Suichuan County Committee at that time.

description.zh-cn: 1935年，时任红15军团政治部秘书长的程坦与宣传科长刘华清一起，将“三大纪律八项注意”的条文编成了歌词。
description.en: In 1935, Cheng Tan, then Secretary-General of the Political Department of the 15th Red Army Corps, along with Propaganda Section Chief Liu Huaqing, compiled the provisions of the 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention' into song lyrics.

description.zh-cn: 1935年，时任红15军团政治部宣传科长的刘华清与秘书长程坦一起，将“三大纪律八项注意”的条文编成了歌词。
description.en: In 1935, Liu Huaqing, then Head of the Propaganda Section of the Political Department of the 15th Red Army Corps, along with Secretary-General Cheng Tan, compiled the provisions of the 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention' into song lyrics.

position.en: Head of the Propaganda Section of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 《三大纪律八项注意》歌曲采用了《土地革命完成了》的曲谱。
description.en: The song 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention' used the musical score of 'Land Revolution is Completed'.

description.zh-cn: 《三大纪律八项注意》歌曲改编自《大帅练兵歌》。
description.en: The song 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention' was adapted from 'The Warlord's Training Song'.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯在天津小站主持了新军的编练。
description.en: Yuan Shikai supervised the training of the New Army at Xiaozhan, Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 《大帅练兵歌》是在小站练兵期间产生的歌曲。
description.en: 'The Warlord's Training Song' was a song created during the Xiaozhan military training period.

description.zh-cn: 张之洞将《大帅练兵歌》的曲调重新填词，作为湖北新军的队列歌曲。
description.en: Zhang Zhidong rewrote the lyrics to the tune of 'The Warlord's Training Song' to serve as the marching song for the Hubei New Army.

description.zh-cn: 源自《大帅练兵歌》的歌曲成为汉阳兵工厂厂歌。
description.en: The song, originating from 'The Warlord's Training Song', became the anthem of the Hanyang Arsenal.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军在第二次国内革命战争期间与蒋介石领导的国民党军队作战。
description.en: The Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army fought against the Kuomintang army led by Chiang Kai-shek during the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石是国民革命军的最高领导人。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek was the supreme leader of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 在1984年夏季奥林匹克运动会开幕式上，中华人民共和国代表团及中华台北代表团入场时，均采用《三大纪律八项注意》歌曲的旋律作为背景音乐。
description.en: At the opening ceremony of the 1984 Summer Olympics, the melody of the song 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention' was used as the background music for the entrance of both the People's Republic of China delegation and the Chinese Taipei delegation.

description.zh-cn: 海峡之声广播电台将《三大纪律八项注意》的编钟版本用作广播开始曲。
description.en: The Voice of the Strait radio station uses a chime version of 'Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention' as its broadcast opening theme.
